Class SOp<RESPONSE_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.requests.SOp<RESPONSE_TYPE>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BladeBase.SReq, SIOp

    public abstract class SOp<RESPONSE_TYPE>
extends java.lang.Object
implements SyncOperation<RESPONSE_TYPE>
    A synchronous operation, optionally used to define a SyncRequest.
